items.answer: We offer flexible order quantities ranging from prototype batches to large-scale industrial production runs.
items.question: What are your minimum order quantities?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume.

items.answer: We are ISO 9001:2015 certified with rigorous quality control processes and advanced inspection technologies.
items.question: What quality certifications do you maintain?

items.answer: Yes, we specialize in custom precision component design and manufacturing with comprehensive engineering support.

items.answer: We primarily work with brass, but also offer capabilities in stainless steel, aluminum, and specialized alloys.
